statements: UPDATE patients SET age = 35, body_temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE patients SET heart_rate = 75 WHERE gender = 'Male'
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Male', contact_number = '+1234567890' WHERE patient_id = 1
UPDATE patients SET heart_rate = 75.5, body_temperature = 98.6, wearable_device_id = 101 WHERE patient_name = 'Alice'
UPDATE Patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE HealthData SET blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 102;
UPDATE Patients SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE HealthData SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE patient_health_data SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE doctor_profiles SET specialization = 'Cardiology', location = 'Hospital A' WHERE doctor_id = 3;
UPDATE patient_health_data SET heart_rate = 75, blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 101
UPDATE monitoring_devices SET firmware_version = 'v2.0.1', manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' WHERE device_id = 201

steps_count: 5000, heart_rate: 75 }' WHERE wearable_id=2001;
UPDATE patients SET age = age + 1, contact_number = '555-1234' WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE wearable_devices SET device_name = 'Fitbit Versa 3', device_type = 'Smartwatch' WHERE device_id = 101;

UPDATE health_data SET heart_rate = 75 WHERE data_id = 201;
